ai.summary: Greenway Route B is an easy 3.4 km hike in the UK. The route offers a gentle, family-friendly walk along well-maintained paths with light elevation and minimal technical difficulty.
ai.terrain_summary: Terrain is primarily flat to gently rolling, on a mix of surfaced paths and well-trodden trails. Expect grassy sections and occasional mud after rain; good footwear is recommended.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear, check the weather forecast, and stay on marked paths. Bring water, a light layer, and a small first aid kit. Be mindful of daylight hours in winter and keep children and pets under supervision.
recommended_gear: Weather-appropriate clothing (layers, hat, gloves as needed)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn (roughly March to October); the route can be enjoyed year-round with proper clothing and footwear.
